lines.line: Oi, whaddya want?
I want to come through this gate.
Barbarians only. Are you a barbarian? You don't look like one.
Hmm, yep you've got me there.
Looks can be deceiving, I am in fact a barbarian.
Are you, now? Free up some space so you can carry something, and we'll see how barbarian you really are.
If you're a barbarian you need to be able to drink like one. We barbarians like a good drink.
I have the perfect challenge for you... The Alfred Grimhand Barcrawl! First completed by Alfred Grimhand.
Take that card to each of the bars named on it. The bartenders will know what it means. We're kinda well known.
They'll give you their strongest drink and sign your card. When you've done all that, we'll be happy to let you in.
I want some money.
Do I look like a bank to you?
So, how's the Barcrawl coming along?
I haven't finished it yet.
Well come back when you have, you lightweight.
Not too bad. I've got my barcrawl card stored somewhere for safe-keeping.
You need to take it with you when you're going on a barcrawl.
I've lost my barcrawl card...
What are you like? You're gonna have to start all over now.
What can I do yer for?
I'm doing Alfred Grimhand's Barcrawl.
Oh no not another of you guys. These barbarian barcrawls cause too much damage to my bar.
You're going to have to pay 50 gold for the Uncle Humphrey's Gutrot.
I don't have 50 coins.
Blearrgh!
Ah, you've come to the best stop on your list! I'll give you my famous Fire Toad Blast! It'll cost you 10 coins.
I don't have 10 coins right now.
Yohoho me hearty what would you like to drink?
Haha time to be breaking out the old Supergrog. That'll be 15 coins please.
Sorry I don't have 15 coins.
What can I get you?
What's on the menu?
Dragon Bitter and Greenman's Ale, oh and some cheap beer.
I suppose you'll be wanting some Fire Brandy. That'll cost you 12 coins.
Sorry I don't have 12 coins.
Would you like to buy a drink?
What do you serve?
Beer!
Fancy a bit of Heart Stopper then do you? It'll only be 8 coins.
Sorry, I don't have 8 coins.
Good morning, what would you like?
Oh you're a barbarian then. Now which of these barrels contained the Liverbane Ale? That'll be 18 coins please.
Sorry, I don't have 18 coins.
Can I help you?
Ah, there seems to be a fair few doing that one these days. My supply of Olde Suspiciouse is starting to run low, it'll cost you 10 coins.
Thanksh very mush...
Hey, are you wanting to try some of my fine wines and spirits? All brewed locally on Karamja island.
Ah, you'll be wanting some Ape Bite Liqueur then. It's got a lovely banana taste, and it'll only cost you 7 coins.
I don't have 7 coins right now.
Mmmmm, dat was luverly...
Heya! What can I get you?
Heehee, this'll be fun!
You'll be after our Hand of Death cocktail, then. Lots of expensive parts to the cocktail, though, so it will cost you 70 coins.
I don't have that much money on me.
Are you sure? You look a bit skinny for that.
Just give me whatever I need to drink here.
Ok one Black Skull Ale coming up, 8 coins please.
I don't have 8 coins with me.
Hiccup!
I tink I jusht 'bout done dem all... but I losht count...
Yep that seems fine, you can come in now. I never learned to read, but you look like you've drunk plenty. Also, one more thing...
Since you drink like a barbarian, I can show you how to smash your vials when you finish them. Do you want to do that?
Yes please, I want to smash my vials.
Itâ€™s all part of drinking like a barbarian! Okay, you will now smash your vials as you drink your potions.
No thank you, I'd rather keep my vials.

characters.name: Barbarian guard
characters.description: Adult male, gruff Scottish accent, boisterous and direct tone, an illiterate but proud warrior who respects drinking prowess over formal credentials.

characters.name: Bartender
characters.description: Middle-aged male, working-class British accent, friendly but businesslike tone, a no-nonsense tavern keeper who has seen plenty of barcrawlers come through.

characters.name: Blurberry
characters.description: Adult male gnome, high-pitched cheerful voice with a refined British accent, proud and professional cocktail master who takes great pride in his signature drinks.

characters.name: Tina
characters.description: Young adult female, cheerful British accent with an assertive edge, a friendly barmaid who enjoys a good laugh but won't tolerate nonsense about payment.

characters.name: Zembo
characters.description: Middle-aged male, slightly slurred Caribbean accent, laid-back and jovial tone, a perpetually tipsy bartender who samples his own tropical wares on Karamja.
